availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Francis Marion McGraw (Boyle County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Boyle County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Ann Catherine McGraw. Father of Diana McGraw, John McGraw, Nannie McGraw, Ernest McGraw, James McGraw and Mary McGraw. Resident in Boyle County in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyle, District 1, p. 342B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyle, Precinct 2, p. 9.
Find A Grave, "Francis Marion McGraw (July 19, 1830-March 11, 1891)," Memorial #47447436, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/47447436 (accessed May 25, 2018).
